translator_notes: This page continues the table of contents with chapters 48-74
「脂粉香娃」(Fragrant Beauty) is a playful name for Shi Xiangyun
「借刀杀人」(Kill with a Borrowed Sword) is one of the Thirty-Six Stratagems - here referring to Wang Xifeng's scheme
「绣春囊」(Embroidered Spring Pouch) is an erotic object whose discovery leads to the infamous search of Grand View Garden in Chapter 74
Chapter 63 features the famous 'flower name lottery' scene and the death of Jia Jing
Chapters 65-69 contain the tragic story of Second and Third Sister You
research_notes: The search of Grand View Garden (抄检大观园) in Chapter 74 is a pivotal moment marking the beginning of the Jia family's decline
Chapter 70's 'Willow Catkin Lyrics' is one of the most celebrated poetry competitions in the novel
